casebody.data:
IN RE J.G. S255628 Supreme Court of California. JULY 10, 2019 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Groban, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of related issues in In re Ricardo P., S230923, and People v. Trujillo , S244650 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court. Kruger, J., was absent and did not participate.
